(The NinePatch image is saved as <c0>res/drawable/my_button_background.9.png</c0>

(e.g. <c1><a2>getAdapterPosition()</a2></c1>, <c3><a4>findViewHolderForAdapterPosition(int)</a4></c3>) You should use these methods when you need to work with up-to-date adapter positions even if they may not have been reflected to layout yet.
(比如 <c1><a2>getAdapterPosition()</a2></c1>，<c3><a4>findViewHolderForAdapterPosition(int)</a4></c3>) 当你需要去使用最新的适配器位置时，你应该使用这些方法，即使这些位置还没有针对布局进行更新。

<a0><c1>ConstraintLayout</c1></a0> allows you to create large and complex layouts with a flat view hierarchy (no nested view groups).

<b0>Note:</b0> <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1> is available as a support library that you can use on Android systems starting with API level 9 (Gingerbread).
<b0>注意：</b0> <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1>可用作支持库，您可以在从API级别9（Gingerbread）开始的Android系统上使用。
<b0>Packed:</b0> The views are packed together (after margins are accounted for).
<b0>Packed:</b0> view被打包在一起(在考虑边距之后)。
<b0>Spread inside:</b0> The first and last view are affixed to the constraints on each end of the chain and the rest are evenly distributed.
<b0>Spread inside:</b0> 第一个和最后一个view被附加到链的每个端部上的约束，并且其余的是均匀分布的。
<b0>Spread:</b0> The views are evenly distributed (after margins are accounted for).
<b0>Spread:</b0> view均匀分布(在考虑边距之后)。
<b0>Video 4.</b0> Creating a chain from the action menu
<b0>Video 4.</b0> 从操作菜单创建链
<b0>Video 5.</b0> Adjusting the constraint bias
<b0>Video 5.</b0> 调整约束编移
<b0>Weighted:</b0> When the chain is set to either <b1>spread</b1> or <b2>spread inside</b2>, you can fill the remaining space by setting one or more views to "match constraints" (<c3>0dp</c3>).
<b0>Weighted:</b0> 当链被设置为<b1>spread</b1> 或 <b2>spread inside</b2>，您可以通过将一个或多个view设置为(<c3>0dp</c3>)来填充剩余空间。

<c0>@Deprecated</c0>: The @Deprecated annotation must be used whenever the use of the annotated element is discouraged.
<c0>@Deprecated</c0>：只要某个语言元素已不再建议使用了，就必须使用@Deprecated annotation。
<c0>@Override</c0>: The @Override annotation must be used whenever a method overrides the declaration or implementation from a super-class.
<c0>@Override</c0>：只要某个方法重写了方法申明或者从父类继承，就必须使用@Override annotation。
<c0>@SuppressWarnings</c0>: The @SuppressWarnings annotation should be used only under circumstances where it is impossible to eliminate a warning.
<c0>@SuppressWarnings</c0>：@SuppressWarnings annotation 仅用于无法消除编译警告的场合。
<c0>CHAIN_PACKED</c0> -- the elements of the chain will be packed together.
<c0>CHAIN_PACKED</c0> -- 链的元素将被打包在一起。

<c0>Canvas</c0>: Canvas to draw into
<c0>Canvas</c0>: 要绘制进的Canvas
<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> has a specific handling of widgets being marked as <c1>View.GONE</c1>.
<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0>对被标记为<c1>View.GONE</c1>的小部件有特别的处理。
<c0>DEBUG</c0>: Use to further note what is happening on the device that could be relevant to investigate and debug unexpected behaviors.
<c0>DEBUG</c0>：该级别的日志应该用于进一步记录有关调查、调试意外现象的设备事件。

<c0>ERROR</c0>: Use when something fatal has happened, i.e. something will have user-visible consequences and won't be recoverable without explicitly deleting some data, uninstalling applications, wiping the data partitions or reflashing the entire device (or worse).
<c0>ERROR</c0>：该级别日志应该在致命错误发生时使用，也就是说，错误的后果能被用户看到，但是不明确删除部分数据、卸装程序、清除数据区或重新刷机（或更糟糕）就无法恢复。
<c0>GONE</c0> widgets, as usual, are not going to be displayed and are not part of the layout itself (i.e. their actual dimensions will not be changed if marked as <c1>GONE</c1>).
通常，<c0>GONE</c0>小部件不会被显示，并且不是布局本身的一部分（即如果标记为<c1>GONE</c1>则其实际尺寸将不会改变）。
<c0>INFORMATIVE:</c0> Use to note that something interesting to most people happened, i.e. when a situation is detected that is likely to have widespread impact, though isn't necessarily an error.
<c0>INFORMATIVE</c0> ：该级别的日志应该用于记录大部分人都会感兴趣的事件，也就是说，如果检测到事件的影响面可能很广，但不一定是错误。
<c0>Rect</c0>: Rect to receive the output.

<c0>RecyclerView</c0>: 该ItemDecoration在装饰的RecyclerView。

绝对不要使用<c0>System.out.println()</c0> （或native代码中的 <c1>printf()</c1>）。
<c0>VERBOSE</c0>: Use for everything else.
<c0>VERBOSE</c0> ：该级别日志应用于所有其余的事件。

<c0>WARNING</c0>: Use when something serious and unexpected happened, i.e. something that will have user-visible consequences but is likely to be recoverable without data loss by performing some explicit action, ranging from waiting or restarting an app all the way to re-downloading a new version of an application or rebooting the device.
<c0>WARNING</c0>：该级别日志应该用于那些重大的、意外的事件，也就是说，错误的后果能被用户看到，但是不采取明确的动作可能就无法无损恢复，从等待或重启应用开始，直至重新下载新版程序或重启设备。

<e0>Adapter:</e0> A subclass of <c1><a2>RecyclerView.Adapter</a2></c1> responsible for providing views that represent items in a data set.

<e0>Anytime somebody has an empty catch clause they should have a creepy feeling.

<e0>Binding:</e0> The process of preparing a child view to display data corresponding to a <e1>position</e1> within the adapter.
<e0>Binding（绑定）：</e0>准备一个view（用于显示adapter中相应<e1>position</e1>的 数据）的过程。
<e0>Dirty (view):</e0> A child view that must be rebound by the adapter before being displayed.

<e0>Index:</e0> The index of an attached child view as used in a call to <c1><a2>getChildAt(int)</a2></c1>.

<e0>Note: The entire view tree is single threaded.
<e0>注意：整个view树是一个单一的线程。
<e0>Position:</e0> The position of a data item within an <e1>Adapter</e1>.
<e0>Position（位置）：</e0> 数据项在<e1>Adapter</e1>中的位置。
<e0>Recycle (view):</e0> A view previously used to display data for a specific adapter position may be placed in a cache for later reuse to display the same type of data again later.
<e0>Recycle（复用）(view)</e0> 一个view之前用于显示adapter中某个位置的数据，它可能会被放到缓存中，以便于之后再次使用用于显示相同类型的数据。
<e0>Scrap (view):</e0> A child view that has entered into a temporarily detached state during layout.
<e0>Scrap (view):</e0>指在布局过程中，一个进入暂时分离状态的子view。

A <c0><a1>NinePatchDrawable</a1></c0> graphic is a stretchable bitmap image, which Android will automatically resize to accommodate the contents of the View in which you have placed it as the background.
<c0><a1>NinePatchDrawable</a1></c0>图形是一个可伸缩的位图，如果你把它设置为背影，安卓将会自动缩放以适应View的内容。
A <c0><a1>RecyclerView.LayoutManager</a1></c0> implementations that lays out items in a grid.
一个<c0><a1>RecyclerView.LayoutManager</a1></c0>的实现，它布局item在一个表格中。
A <c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> is a <c1><a2>ViewGroup</a2></c1> which allows you to position and size widgets in a flexible way.
【参考：代码咖啡.细细品读！深入浅出，官方文档看ConstraintLayout.http://www.jianshu.com/p/38ee0aa654a8】<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> 是一个 <c1><a2>ViewGroup</a2></c1>，它允许您以灵活的方式定位和设置小部件大小。

A <c0>LayoutManager</c0> is responsible for measuring and positioning item views within a <c1>RecyclerView</c1> as well as determining the policy for when to recycle item views that are no longer visible to the user.
<c0>LayoutManager</c0>负责在<c1>RecyclerView</c1> 中测量和定位item views，同时决定当item views对用户不可见时的复用策略。

A LayoutManager that lays out children in a staggered grid formation.
该LayoutManager可以以交错网格的形式布置子view。
A Listener interface that can be attached to a RecylcerView to get notified whenever a ViewHolder is attached to or detached from RecyclerView.
监听接口，可以附加给RecylcerView，以在ViewHolder添加给RecyclerView或移除时获得通知。

A NinePatch drawable is a standard PNG image that includes an extra 1-pixel-wide border.
NinePatch drawable是包含1像素宽度的边框的标准PNG图片。
A PageTransformer is invoked whenever a visible/attached page is scrolled.
PageTransformer会在一个visible/attached的页面滚动时调用。
A Recycler is responsible for managing scrapped or detached item views for reuse.
Recycler负责管理scrapped（报废、销毁）或detached（分离）的item views时以用于复用。
A RecyclerListener can be set on a RecyclerView to receive messages whenever a view is recycled.
RecyclerListener可以设置给RecyclerView，当view被复用时可以收到消息。
A View occupies a rectangular area on the screen and is responsible for drawing and event handling.
一个View占据了屏幕上的一块矩形区域，并负责绘制和事件处理。
A ViewHolder describes an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView.
ViewHolder描述了在RecyclerView中的一个item view以及它所在位置的元数据。
A callback interface that can be used to alter the drawing order of RecyclerView children.
改变RecyclerView子控件的绘制顺序的回调接口。
A chain allows you to distribute a group of views horizontally or vertically with the following styles (as shown in figure 14):
链允许您使用以下样式水平或垂直分发一组view(如图14所示)：
A chain is a group of views that are linked to each other with bi-directional position constraints.
链是用双向位置约束彼此链接的一组view。
A chain works properly only if each end of the chain is constrained to another object on the same axis, as shown in figure 13.
只有链的每一端都被约束到同一轴上的另一个对象，链才能正常工作，如图13所示。

正则表达式的编译表示。

A helper class to provide the number of spans each item occupies.
一个助手类，它可以提供每个item占据的span数量。

A loss of network connectivity that has consequences within an app should be logged at the DEBUG or VERBOSE level (depending on whether the consequences are serious enough and unexpected enough to be logged in a release build).
影响范围限于应用程序内部的网络中断应该记录在DEBUG或VERBOSE级别的日志中（根据影响的严重程度及意外程度，再来确定是否在发行版本中也记录日志）。
A matcher finds matches in a subset of its input called the <i0>region</i0>.
匹配器在其输入的子集（称为 <i0>region</i0> ）中查找匹配项。
A matcher is created from a pattern by invoking the pattern's <c0><a1>matcher</a1></c0> method.
通过调用pattern的 <c0><a1>matcher</a1></c0> 方法从pattern创建匹配器。
A matcher may be reset explicitly by invoking its <c0><a1>reset()</a1></c0> method or, if a new input sequence is desired, its <c2><a3>reset(CharSequence)</a3></c2> method.
可以通过调用匹配器的 <c0><a1>reset()</a1></c0>方法来显式重置匹配器，如果需要新输入序列，则调用其<c2><a3>reset(CharSequence)</a3></c2> 方法。
A more sophisticated component may override even more <c0>on...</c0> methods and introduce some of its own helper methods, substantially customizing its properties and behavior.
一个更复杂的组件可以重写更多的<c0>on...</c0>方法，并引入一些自己的助手方法，充分地自定义自己的属性和行为。
A parent view may call measure() more than once on its children.
一个父view可能在子view上多次调用measure()方法。

A partial list of available widgets includes <c0><a1>Button</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>TextView</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>EditText</a5></c4>, <c6><a7>ListView</a7></c6>, <c8><a9>CheckBox</a9></c8>, <c10><a11>RadioButton</a11></c10>, <c12><a13>Gallery</a13></c12>, <c14><a15>Spinner</a15></c14>, and the more special-purpose <c16><a17>AutoCompleteTextView</a17></c16>, <c18><a19>ImageSwitcher</a19></c18>, and <c20><a21>TextSwitcher</a21></c20>.

部分可用的控件列表包括<c0><a1>Button</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>TextView</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>EditText</a5></c4>, <c6><a7>ListView</a7></c6>, <c8><a9>CheckBox</a9></c8>, <c10><a11>RadioButton</a11></c10>, <c12><a13>Gallery</a13></c12>, <c14><a15>Spinner</a15></c14>，以及更多特殊目的的控件如 <c16><a17>AutoCompleteTextView</a17></c16>, <c18><a19>ImageSwitcher</a19></c18>,<c20><a21>TextSwitcher</a21></c20>等。
A useful aspect of <c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> is in how it deals with "impossible" constrains.
<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0>一个有用的方面是如何处理“不可能”的约束。
A view actually possess two pairs of width and height values.
一个view实际上控制两对宽高值。
A view can be a part of both a horizontal and a vertical chain, making it easy to build flexible grid layouts.
view可以是水平和垂直链的一部分，使得构建灵活的网格布局变得容易。
A view has a location, expressed as a pair of <e0>left</e0> and <e1>top</e1> coordinates, and two dimensions, expressed as a width and a height.
view有一个位置，表示为一对<e0>left</e0> 和 <e1>top</e1> 坐标，以及两个尺寸，表示为宽和高。
A view's measured width and measured height values must respect the constraints imposed by the view's parents.
view的measured width 和 measured height值，必须尊守父类给的限制。

如果需要，添加一个view到当前附加的RecyclerVidew上。

给该RecyclerView添加<c0><a1>RecyclerView.ItemDecoration</a1></c0>。

An ItemDecoration allows the application to add a special drawing and layout offset to specific item views from the adapter's data set.
ItemDecoration允许应用为特定的item view（来自adapter的数据集）添加一个特殊的绘制和布局偏移。

An OnItemTouchListener allows the application to intercept touch events in progress at the view hierarchy level of the RecyclerView before those touch events are considered for RecyclerView's own scrolling behavior.
OnItemTouchListener允许应用程序在RecyclerView自己的滚动行为被考虑之前，在RecyclerView的视图层次结构级别拦截正在进行的触摸事件。
An OnScrollListener can be added to a RecyclerView to receive messages when a scrolling event has occurred on that RecyclerView.

If a View object sets the NinePatch as its background and then specifies the View's text, it will stretch itself so that all the text fits inside only the area designated by the right and bottom lines (if included).
如果一个View对象设置了NinePatch作为它的背景，并申明的view的文字，它将缩放自己以使得所有的文字处于右边和上边的线申明的区域内。（如果包含右边或上边的线）
If a comment line contains an example command or a literal URL longer than 100 characters, that line may be longer than 100 characters for ease of cut and paste.
如果注释行包含了超过100个字符的命令示例或者URL文字，为了便于剪切和复制，其长度可以超过100个字符。
If a method exceeds 40 lines or so, think about whether it can be broken up without harming the structure of the program.
如果方法代码超过了40行，就该考虑是否可以在不损害程序结构的前提下进行分拆。
If a single thread issues a sequence of method invocations that violates the contract of an object, the object may throw this exception.
如果单线程发出违反对象协定的方法调用序列，则该对象可能抛出此异常。
If a variable is initialized with the return value of a method that throws a checked exception, it must be initialized inside a try block.
如果变量是用方法的返回值来初始化的，而该方法可能会抛出一个checked异常，那么必须在try块中进行变量声明。
If a warning passes this "impossible to eliminate" test, the @SuppressWarnings annotation <e1>must</e1> be used, so as to ensure that all warnings reflect actual problems in the code.
如果警告确实经过测试“不可能消除”，则 <e1>必须</e1>使用@SuppressWarnings annotation，以确保所有的警告都能真实反映代码中的问题。
If applied to an int array, every element in the array represents a color integer.
如果应用于一个 int 数组，数组中的每个元素都代表一个颜色的整型。
If both the width and height are set to match constraints, you can click <b0>Toggle Aspect Ratio Constraint</b0> to select which dimension is based on a ratio of the other.
如果宽度和高度都设置为match constraints，你可以单击 <b0>Toggle Aspect Ratio Constraint</b0>来选择哪个尺寸基于另一个比率。
If either <c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0> or <c2><a3>invalidate()</a3></c2> were called, the framework will take care of measuring, laying out, and drawing the tree as appropriate.
如果<c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0> 或者 <c2><a3>invalidate()</a3></c2>被调用，框架将负责计算、布局及绘制适当的view树。
If in the course of processing the event, the view's bounds may need to be changed, the view will call <c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0>.
在处理事件的过程中，如果view的边界可能需要改变，view将会调用<c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0>方法。
If it's not obvious what the property "Foo" means, you should document it.
如果“Foo”属性的意义不容易理解，也应该进行注释。
If margins are specified on connections, they will be taken in account.
如果在链上指定了margins，它们将会被考虑在内。
If no match has yet been attempted, or if the previous match operation failed
如果没有尝试任何匹配或者以前的匹配操作失败
If none of the prebuilt widgets or layouts meets your needs, you can create your own View subclass.
如果预制的组件和布局都不能满足你的需求，你可以创建自己的View子类。
If one or more elements are using <c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0>, they will use the available empty space (equally divided among themselves).
如果一个或多个元素使用<c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0>，它们将使用可用的空白空间（在它们之前平分）。
If side margins are set, they will be applied to the corresponding constraints (if they exist) (Fig. 3), enforcing the margin as a space between the target and the source side.
如果设置了边界的margins，它们将被应用于相应的约束（如果存在）（图3），将边距作为目标和源端之间的空间。
If that code uses spaces around the if clauses, you should too.
如果它们在if语句前后使用了空格，那你也应该遵循。
If the IntDef#flag() attribute is set to true, multiple constants can be combined.
如果 IntDef#flag() 属性设置为 true ，则可以组合多个常量。

If the LayoutManager specifies a default constructor or one with the signature (<c0><a1>Context</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>AttributeSet</a3></c2>, <c4>int</c4>, <c5>int</c5>), RecyclerView will instantiate and set the LayoutManager when being inflated.
如果LayoutManager指定了默认的或是签名为 (<c0><a1>Context</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>AttributeSet</a3></c2>, <c4>int</c4>, <c5>int</c5>)的构造方法，RecyclerView将在被加载时初始化并设置LayoutManager。
If the animation is attached to a view that has children, the animation will affect the entire subtree rooted by that node.
如果动画附加到一个有子view的view，动画将会影响该view节点下的整个view树。
If the annotated element is a class, then all methods in the class should be called on a worker thread.
如果注解的元素是一个类，则类中的所有方法都应该只在工作线程被调用。
If the annotated element is a class, then all methods in the class should be called on the UI thread.
如果注解的元素是一个类，则类中的所有方法都应该只在 UI 线程被调用。
If the annotated element is a class, then all methods in the class should be called on the binder thread.
如果注解的元素是一个类，则类中的所有方法都应该只在绑定线程被调用。
If the annotated element is a class, then all methods in the class should be called on the main thread.
如果注解的元素是一个类，则类中的所有方法都应该只在主线程被调用。
If the child is the start of a horizontal chain, this attribute will drive how the elements of the chain will be positioned.
如果该child是水平链的开头，该属性将驱动链的元素如何定位。
If the child is the start of a vertical chain, this attribute will drive how the elements of the chain will be positioned.
如果child是垂直链的开头，该属性将会驱动链的元素的如何定位。
If the code comments have little boxes of stars around them, make your comments have little boxes of stars around them too.
如果它们的注释是用星号组成的框框围起来的，那也请你照办。
If the code you add to a file looks drastically different from the existing code around it, it throws readers out of their rhythm when they go to read it.
如果你要加入的代码和已存在的代码风格迥异，那就会突然打破阅读的节奏。
If the contents don't fit in this region, then the image will be stretched so that they do.
如果内容不适应该区域，图片将会被拉伸以便适应。
If the device has touch capabilities, however, and the user begins interacting with the interface by touching it, it is no longer necessary to always highlight, or give focus to, a particular view.
然而，如果设备有触摸能力，当用户用解摸来进行交互时，将不必给特定的view进行高亮或给予焦点。
If the match was successful but the group specified failed to match any part of the input sequence, then <t0>null</t0> is returned.
如果该匹配成功了，但指定组未能匹配输入序列的任何部分，则返回<t0>null</t0>。
If the method does something more complex (such as enforcing a constraint or has an important side effect), then you must document it.
但如果方法执行了比较复杂的操作（比如执行强制约束或者产生很重要的副作用），那就必须进行注释。
If the padding lines are not included, Android uses the left and top lines to define this drawable area.
如果没有设置padding线，安卓使用左边和上边的线来定义绘制区域。
If the returned array is of non-zero length then the first element of the array represents the top of the stack, which is the most recent method invocation in the sequence.
如果返回的数组非零长度，则数组的第一个元素表示堆栈的顶部，这是序列中最近的方法调用。
If the specific type is known, use one of the more specific annotations instead, such as <c0><a1>StringRes</a1></c0> or <c2><a3>DrawableRes</a3></c2>.
如果已知特定的类型，使用一个更具体的注解代替，如 <c0><a1>StringRes</a1></c0> 或 <c2><a3>DrawableRes</a3></c2>。
If the value must be used outside of the try block, then it must be declared before the try block, where it cannot yet be sensibly initialized:
如果需在try块之外使用该变量，那它就必须在try块之前就进行声明了，这时它是不可能进行正确的初始化的。
If there are multiple annotations, or parameterized annotations, they should each be listed one-per-line in alphabetical order.
如果存在多个annotation，或者annotation是参数化的，则应按字母顺序各占一行来列出。
If there is a component that is already very similar to what you want, you can simply extend that component and just override the behavior that you want to change.
如果有一个组件已经非常接近你想要的组件，你可以简单的继承那个组件并且重写你想要改变的行为。

If there is a security manager, and this thread is not the current thread, then the security manager's <t0>checkPermission</t0> method is called with a <t1>RuntimePermission("getStackTrace")</t1> permission to see if it's ok to get the stack trace.
如果有安全管理器，并且此线程不是当前线程，则会调用安全管理器的<t0>checkPermission</t0>方法（带 <t1>RuntimePermission("getStackTrace")</t1> 的权限作为参数）来查看是否可以获取堆栈跟踪。
If there is no capturing group in the pattern with the given index
如果在给定索引的模式中不存在捕获组
If they have constraints to other widgets they will still be respected, but any margins will be as if equals to zero
如果他们对其他小部件有约束力，那么他们仍然会受到尊重，但任何margin都将等于零（译注：GONE的小部件margin不生效。）
If this Fragment is a child of another Fragment, the FragmentManager returned here will be the parent's <c0><a1>getChildFragmentManager()</a1></c0>.
如果该Fragment是另一个Fragment的child，此处返回的FragmentManager应该是parent的<c0><a1>getChildFragmentManager()</a1></c0>.
If this ItemDecoration does not affect the positioning of item views, it should set all four fields of <c0>outRect</c0> (left, top, right, bottom) to zero before returning.
如果该ItemDecoration不影响item views的位置，在返回前应该把 <c0>outRect</c0> 的四个字段都设为0(left, top, right, bottom)。

If this method is overridden, it is the subclass's responsibility to make sure the measured height and width are at least the view's minimum height and width (<c0><a1>getSuggestedMinimumHeight()</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>getSuggestedMinimumWidth()</a3></c2>).
如果重写了这个方法，子类要确保测量出的宽高，最小要为view的最小宽高(<c0><a1>getSuggestedMinimumHeight()</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>getSuggestedMinimumWidth()</a3></c2>).
If value is not a valid number, 80 is substituted.
如果值不是有效的数字，将会使用80代替。
If value is not a valid number, die.
如果值不是有效的数字，结束。
If you absolutely need it, define a close() method (or the like) and document exactly when that method needs to be called (see InputStream for an example).
如果确实是需要使用finalizer，那就定义一个close()方法（或类似的方法），并且在文档中准确地记录下需要调用该方法的时机（相关例程可以参见InputStream）。
If you add opposing constraints on a view, the constraint lines become squiggly like a spring to indicate the opposing forces, as shown in video 2.
如果在view上添加了相反的约束，约束线会变成像弹簧一样扭曲来表示相反的力，就像视频2。
If you are not overriding <c2><a3>getSpanIndex(int, int)</a3></c2>, you should set this to true for better performance.
如果你正重写<c2><a3>getSpanIndex(int, int)</a3></c2>，你应该设置该值为true以获得更好的性能。

If you don't want to create a completely customized component, but instead are looking to put together a reusable component that consists of a group of existing controls, then creating a Compound Component (or Compound Control) might fit the bill.
如果你不想创建完全自定义的组件，而是想创建一个由一组已存在的控件组成的可复用的组件，那么创建一个组合组件（或组合控件）可以满足你的需求。
If you don't yet have enough information to initialize a variable sensibly, postpone the declaration until you do.
如果还缺少足够的信息来正确地初始化变量，那就应该推迟声明，直至可以初始化为止。
If you fail to call this method from an overridden <c5>onMeasure()</c5> method, the result will be an exception at measurement time.
如果你在重写 <c5>onMeasure()</c5> 方法时没有成功调用该方法，在测量时这个结果将会出错。
If you have a faster way to calculate span index for your items, you should override this method.
如果你有更快的方法来计算item的span index，则重写该方法。
If you haven't done so already, import the NotePad sample into Android Studio (or just look at the source using the link provided).
如果你还没看过这个demo，可以导入Android Studio （或者用提供的链接看下源代码。）
If you instead want the view to stretch its size to meet the constraints, <a0>switch the size to "match constraints"</a0>.
如果你想拉伸view的尺寸以满足约束， <a0>把尺寸切换为 "match constraints"</a0>。

If you instead want the view to stretch its size to meet the constraints, <a0>switch the size to "match constraints"</a0>; or if you want to keep the current size but move the view so that it is not centered, <a1>adjust the constraint bias</a1>.
如果你想拉伸view的尺寸以满足约束， <a0>把尺寸切换为 "match constraints"</a0>；或者如果你想保留当前的大小，但想移动view使其不居中，<a1>调整constraint bias</a1>。
If you need to access Adapter for additional data, you can call <c0><a1>getChildAdapterPosition(View)</a1></c0> to get the adapter position of the View.
如果你需要访问Adapter以获取更多的数据，你可以调用 <c0><a1>getChildAdapterPosition(View)</a1></c0> 来获得该view的adapter位置。
If you only need to make small adjustments to an existing widget or layout, you can simply subclass the widget or layout and override its methods.
如果你只需要对现有的widget或layout作小的调整，你可以简单地创建它们的子类并重写相关方法。
If you override this method, you need to make sure it is consistent with <c0><a1>getSpanSize(int)</a1></c0>.
如果你重写该方法，你需要确保它与<c0><a1>getSpanSize(int)</a1></c0>一致。
If you press the button and select something from the list, it populates the EditText field, but the user can also type something directly into the EditText if they prefer.
如果你按下按钮并从列表中选择了某项，它会填充EditText，但是如果用户想要，也可以直接在EditText中输入。
If you see old code that has a @deprecated Javadoc tag, please add the @Deprecated annotation.
如果看到以前的代码带有@deprecated Javadoc 标记，请加上 @Deprecated annotation。
If you set a background drawable for a View, then the View will draw it before calling back to its <c0>onDraw()</c0> method.
如果你为view设置了一个背景drawable，view将在回调<c0>onDraw()</c0>之前绘制背景。
If you use the @Deprecated annotation, you must also have a @deprecated Javadoc tag and it should name an alternate implementation.
如果使用了@Deprecated annotation，则必须同时进行 @deprecated Javadoc 标记，并且给出一个替代的实现方式。
If you want to use 3D graphics, you must extend <c1><a2>SurfaceView</a2></c1> instead of View, and draw from a separate thread.
如果你想要使用3D图形，你必须继承<c1><a2>SurfaceView</a2></c1>而不是View，并从一个独立的线程画图。
If you'd like more information about the Layout Editor itself, see the Android Studio guide to <a3>Build a UI with Layout Editor</a3>.
如果你想了解有关布局编辑器本身的更多信息，请参阅Android Studio指南<a3>Build a UI with Layout Editor</a3>。
If you're editing code, take a few minutes to look at the surrounding code and determine its style.
。如果你正在编写代码，请花几分钟浏览一下前后的其它代码，以确定它们的风格。
If you're familiar with <c6>layout_weight</c6> in a <a7>linear layout</a7>, this works the same way.
如果你熟悉<a7>linear layout</a7>中的 <c6>layout_weight</c6> 它们的工作方式是相同的。

If your TODO is of the form "At a future date do something" make sure that you either include a very specific date ("Fix by November 2005") or a very specific event ("Remove this code after all production mixers understand protocol V7.").
如果TODO注释是“将来要做某事”的格式，则请确保包含一个很明确的日期（“在2005年11月会修正”），或是一个很明确的事件（“在所有代码整合人员理解了V7协议之后删除本段代码”）。
If your code must compile under Java 1.3, you must omit the exception that is the cause.
如果代码必须在Java 1.3版本下编译，需要忽略该异常。
If your custom View component is not defined as an inner class, then you can, alternatively, declare the View component with the XML element name, and exclude the <c0>class</c0> attribute.
如果你的自定义View组件没有定义为内部类，你也可以用XML的元素名字来申明View组件，而不需要<c0>class</c0>属性。
If your debug logs are dominating the log then you probably should be using verbose logging.
如果debug日志占用了太多的日志空间，那就应该使用详细级别日志（verbose）才更为合适。
Implement this method to handle generic motion events.
实现该方法以处理通用的移动事件。
Implement this method to handle touch screen motion events.
实现该方法以处理触屏事件。
Implement this method to intercept all touch screen motion events.
实现该方法以拦截白发有的触屏事件。
Implement this to do your drawing.
实现来完成自己的绘制。

Implementation of <c0><a1>PagerAdapter</a1></c0> that represents each page as a <c2><a3>Fragment</a3></c2> that is persistently kept in the fragment manager as long as the user can return to the page.
FragmentPagerAdapter是<c0><a1>PagerAdapter</a1></c0>的实现，它将每个页面表现为<c2><a3>Fragment</a3></c2>。只要用户可以返回到页面上，Fragment就会被持久在fragment manager中。
Implementation of <c0><a1>PagerAdapter</a1></c0> that uses a <c2><a3>Fragment</a3></c2> to manage each page.
FragmentStatePagerAdapter是<c0><a1>PagerAdapter</a1></c0>的一个实现，它使用 <c2><a3>Fragment</a3></c2> 来管理每一页。
Implementing a Custom View
实现一个自定义view
Implements a non-terminal append-and-replace step.
实现非终端添加和替换步骤。
Implements a terminal append-and-replace step.
实现终端添加和替换步骤。
Import lines can go over the limit because humans rarely see them (this also simplifies tool writing).
import行可以超过限制，因为很少有人会去阅读它（这也简化了编程工具的写入操作）。
Imports from third parties (<c0>com</c0>, <c1>junit</c1>, <c2>net</c2>, <c3>org</c3>)
从第三方的imports（<c0>com</c0>、 <c1>junit</c1>、 <c2>net</c2>、 <c3>org</c3>）

In Android, there are actually two other Views readily available to do this: <c0><a1>Spinner</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>AutoCompleteTextView</a3></c2>, but regardless, the concept of a Combo Box makes an easy-to-understand example.
在安卓中，事实上有2个View真的可以这样做，<c0><a1>Spinner</a1></c0> 和 <c2><a3>AutoCompleteTextView</a3></c2>但不管怎样，Combo Box的概念让这个例子更好理解。
In Java you can't escape the creepy feeling.</e0> -<a1>James Gosling</a1>
在Java中你无法逃离这种恐惧感。 </e0> -<a1>James Gosling</a1>

In a chain of modules, other than at the VERBOSE level, when a lower-level module detects invalid data coming from a higher-level module, the lower-level module should only log this situation to the DEBUG log, and only if logging provides information that is not otherwise available to the caller.
除了VERBOSE级别外，在一系列嵌套的模块中，当较低级别的模块对来自较高级别模块的非法数据进行检测时，应该只把检测情况记录在DEBUG日志中，并且只记录那些调用者无法获取的信息。
In a nutshell, this brings together a number of more atomic controls (or views) into a logical group of items that can be treated as a single thing.
简而言之，它把更多的原子的控件（或view）组合在成一个有逻辑的项目组，你可以把它单独的东西来对待。
In addition to the View Framework's measurement cache, RecyclerView uses its own additional measurement cache for its children to avoid re-measuring them when not necessary.
在View框架的测量缓存外，RecyclerView为自已的子view使用自己额外的测量缓存以避免当不需要时重新测量。
In addition to the intrinsic capabilities detailed previously, you can also use special helper objects in <c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> to help you with your layout.
除了上面详细介绍的内在功能之外，你也可以在<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0>中使用特殊的帮助对象来帮助你完成布局。
In addition, remember that a @Deprecated method is <e1>still supposed to work</e1>.
此外请记住，被 @Deprecated 的方法 <e1>仍然能正常执行</e1>。
In addition, several convenience methods are offered to avoid unnecessary computations, namely <c0><a1>getRight()</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>getBottom()</a3></c2>.

Keep in mind that the <c0>+</c0> operator, when used on Strings, implicitly creates a <c1>StringBuilder</c1> with the default buffer size (16 characters) and potentially other temporary String objects, i.e. that explicitly creating StringBuilders isn't more expensive than relying on the default '+' operator (and can be a lot more efficient in fact).
请记住，对字符串使用<c0>+</c0> 操作符时，会在后台以默认大小（16个字符）缓冲区创建一个 <c1>StringBuilder</c1>对象，并且可能还会创建一些其它的临时String对象。换句话说，显式创建StringBuilders对象的代价并不会比用'+'操作符更高（事实上效率还将会提高很多）。

Note that the width and height are set to "wrap_content" to make the button fit neatly around the text.
注意宽度和高度是设置为了"wrap_content"以使按钮整齐地包围文字。
Note that this exception does not always indicate that an object has been concurrently modified by a <i0>different</i0> thread.

Note that this will be non-null slightly before <c0><a1>getActivity()</a1></c0>, during the time from when the fragment is placed in a <c2><a3>FragmentTransaction</a3></c2> until it is committed and attached to its activity.

可以先后使用 <c0><a1>appendReplacement</a1></c0> 和 <c2><a3>appendTail</a3></c2> 方法将结果收集到现有的字符串缓冲区，或者使用更加便捷的 <c4><a5>replaceAll</a5></c4> 方法创建一个可以在其中替换输入序列中每个匹配子序列的字符串。
The <c0><a1>find</a1></c0> method scans the input sequence looking for the next subsequence that matches the pattern.
<c0><a1>find</a1></c0> 方法扫描输入序列以查找与该模式匹配的下一个子序列。
The <c0><a1>lookingAt</a1></c0> method attempts to match the input sequence, starting at the beginning, against the pattern.
<c0><a1>lookingAt</a1></c0> 尝试将输入序列从头开始与该模式匹配。
The <c0><a1>matches</a1></c0> method attempts to match the entire input sequence against the pattern.
<c0><a1>matches</a1></c0>方法尝试将整个输入序列与该模式匹配。
The <c0>String</c0> class represents character strings.
<c0>类代表字符串。
The <c0>onDraw()</c0> and <c1>onMeasure()</c1> methods (plus most of the other <c2>on...</c2> methods) will likely have suitable behavior so you don't have to override them.
<c0>onDraw()</c0> 和 <c1>onMeasure()</c1> 方法（加上其他的 <c2>on...</c2>方法) 已经有合适的行为了，不需要重写它们。

The <c0>onDraw()</c0> method delivers you a <c1><a2>Canvas</a2></c1> upon which you can implement anything you want: 2D graphics, other standard or custom components, styled text, or anything else you can think of.
<c0>onDraw()</c0>方法给你提供一个<c1><a2>Canvas</a2></c1>，在其中你可以实现任何你想要的东西。2D图形，其他标准或自定义的组件，带风格的文字，以及任何你想要的别的东西。
The <c1><a2>ViewGroup</a2></c1> subclass is the base class for <e3>layouts</e3>, which are invisible containers that hold other Views (or other ViewGroups) and define their layout properties.
子类<c1><a2>ViewGroup</a2></c1>是<e3>layouts</e3>的基类，它是不可见的容器，持有其他view（或其他ViewGroup）并确定他们的布局特性。

匹配器的显式状态包括最近成功匹配的开始和结束索引。

匹配器的显式状态最初是未定义的； 在成功匹配前尝试查询其中的任何部分将抛出 <c0><a1>IllegalStateException</a1></c0> 。

注解的哈希码是它的成员的哈希码之和（包括那些默认值）；注解的成员的哈希码是 (127 乘以成员名的哈希码，由 <c0><a1>hashCode()</a1></c0> 计算 )，再 XOR 成员值的哈希码；

We recognize that not all existing code follows these rules, but we expect all new code to be compliant.

We require braces around the statements for a conditional.
我们需要用大括号来包裹条件语句块。

如果一个通常要记录日志的事件可能会多次发生，则采取一些频次限制措施或许是个好主意，以防日志被很多重复（或类似）的信息给撑爆了。

当开始一个动画时，框架负责绘制合适的view直到动画完成。

当缓存不可用时，默认的实现将从0到<c2>position</c2>遍历所有的item。
When caching is enabled, it calculates from the closest cached value before the <c3>position</c3>.

创建新的组件时就不要再使用过时的类库了。

在修饰方法调用参数时，指示该参数可以合理地为 null ，该方法将优雅地处理它。
When decorating a method, this denotes the method might legitimately return null.
在修饰一个方法时，指示该方法可以合理地返回 null 。
When enabled, the framework will discard touches that are received whenever the view's window is obscured by another visible window.
当启用时，框架将丢弃收到的触摸事件，不管view的窗口是否被其他可见的窗口掩盖。
When feasible, keep methods small and focused.
尽可能地保持方法简短和重点突出。
When in doubt, be consistent with the surrounding code.
如果存在疑惑，与前后的其它代码保持一致即可。

每当说起java规范，推荐的规范到处都是。符合我们要求的差不多就是“选择一个次序并坚持下去。”于是，我们就选择一个规范，更新规范手册，并让IDE去遵守它。

当指示于一个参数时，该注解指示该方法需要的权限取决于参数的值。(通常所传递的相应字段将是使用 <c0>@RequiresPermission</c0> 注解的一组常量。)

当你在写<c0><a1>RecyclerView.LayoutManager</a1></c0> 时，你几乎总是想要使用layout positions，反之当写<c2><a3>RecyclerView.Adapter</a3></c2>时，你几乎总是想要使用adapter positions。

When you add a constraint to both sides of a view (and the view size for the same dimension is either "fixed" or "wrap content"), the view becomes centered between the two constraints with a bias of 50% by default.
当向view的两侧添加约束时（并且view的尺寸的大小为"fixed" 或 "wrap content"），默认情况下，view将在两个约束之间居中，偏差为50%。
When you add a view in a <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1>, it displays a bounding box with square resizing handles on each corner and circular constraint handles on each side.
当你在<c1>ConstraintLayout</c1>中添加一个view时，它会显示一个边框，每个角上都有方形调整大小的手柄，每边都有圆形的约束手柄。
When you drop a view into the Layout Editor, it stays where you leave it even if it has no constraints.
当你拖动一个view到布局编辑器中，它会停留在你放开它的地方，即使它没有任何约束。

当你松开时，约束就会创建，两个view间用<a0>默认的margin</a0> 隔开。

While logging is necessary, it has a significantly negative impact on performance and quickly loses its usefulness if not kept reasonably terse.
记录日志会对性能产生显著的负面影响。如果日志内容不够简炼的话，很快会丧失可用性。
While much discussion has surrounded this rule, the decision remains that 100 characters is the maximum <e0>with the following exceptions</e0>:
有关本规则的讨论有很多，最后的结论还是最多不超过100个字符<e0>除了以下几种例外情况</e0>：
While they can be handy for doing cleanup (particularly of external resources), there are no guarantees as to when a finalizer will be called (or even that it will be called at all).
尽管它们便于执行清理工作（特别是针对外部资源），但并不能保证调用finalizer的时机（甚至根本就不会调用）。

While you may think your code will never encounter this error condition or that it is not important to handle it, ignoring exceptions as above creates mines in your code for someone else to trigger some day.
也许你会认为：你的代码永远不会碰到这种出错的情况，或者处理异常并不重要，可类似上述忽略异常的代码将会在代码中埋下一颗地雷，说不定哪天它就会炸到某个人了。
Widgets can then be constrained to a Guideline, allowing multiple widgets to be positioned easily from one Guideline, or allowing reactive layout behavior by using percent positioning.
然后，部件可以由Guideline限制，允许多个部件根据Guideline轻松地定位，或通过百分比定位来允许响应式布局。
Widgets can then be positioned by constraining them to such guidelines.
然后部件可以通过这样的guideline来约束定位。
Widgets dimension constraints
小部件尺寸约束
Within a given module, other than at the VERBOSE level, an error should only be reported once if possible.
除了VERBOSE级别外，在同一个模块中同一个错误应该尽可能只报告一次。

Within a single chain of function calls within a module, only the innermost function should return the error, and callers in the same module should only add some logging if that significantly helps to isolate the issue.
同一个模块内的一系列层层嵌套的函数调用中，只有最内层的函数才返回错误；并且只有能为解决问题提供明显帮助的时候，同一模块中的调用方才写入一些日志。
WorkerThread
WorkerThread
WorkerThread - Android SDK | Android Developers
WorkerThread - Android SDK | Android Developers
Write Short Methods
编写简短的方法
XmlRes
XmlRes
XmlRes - Android SDK | Android Developers
XmlRes - Android SDK | Android Developers
You can add a vertical or horizontal guideline to which you can constrain views, and the guideline will be invisible to app users.
你可以添加可以约束view的垂直或者水平的参考线，并且该参考线对于应用用户而言是不可见的。
You can add views either from code or by specifying a tree of views in one or more XML layout files.
你即可以通过代码添加view，也可以在一个或多个XML文件中申明view树。

You can also create listeners for events that your contained views might generate, for example, a listener method for the List Item Click Listener to update the contents of the EditText if a list selection is made.
你也可以监听器来临听内部容纳的view产生的事件，比如如果设置了list选项，可以设置List Item的点击监听器来更新EditText的内容。
You can also define an optional drawable section of the image (effectively, the padding lines) by drawing a line on the right and bottom lines.
你可以选择，通过在右边框或上边框画线，来定义图片的绘制区域，(本质上，就是paddding线。)
You can also define one dimension of a widget as a ratio of the other one.
你还可以把一个小部件的一个尺寸定义为相对于另一个的比例。
You can also select all the views you want to align, and then click <b0>Align</b0> <i1> in the toolbar to select the alignment type.
你还可以选择所有要对齐的view，然后单击工具栏中的<b0>Align</b0> <i1>来选择对齐方式。
You can also use ratio if both dimensions are set to <c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0> (0dp).
如果两个尺寸均设置为 <c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0> （0dp），也可以使用比例。
You can attach an <c0><a1>Animation</a1></c0> object to a view using <c2><a3>setAnimation(Animation)</a3></c2> or <c4><a5>startAnimation(Animation)</a5></c4>.
你可以给view附加一个<c0><a1>Animation</a1></c0>对象，用<c2><a3>setAnimation(Animation)</a3></c2> 或 <c4><a5>startAnimation(Animation)</a5></c4>方法。
You can change it by providing a custom <c0><a1>GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup</a1></c0> instance via <c2><a3>setSpanSizeLookup(SpanSizeLookup)</a3></c2>.
你可以改变它通过提供自定义的<c0><a1>GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup</a1></c0>实例，通过<c2><a3>setSpanSizeLookup(SpanSizeLookup)</a3></c2>。
You can change the way the height and width are calculated by clicking the symbols indicated with callout <s0>3</s0> in figure 10.
你可以通过单击图10中标注 <s0>3</s0>所示的符号来更改计算高度和宽度的方式。
You can constrain a widget on the horizontal and vertical axis:
您可以在水平和垂直轴上约束小部件：
You can control this behavior via <c0><a1>setGapStrategy(int)</a1></c0>.
你可以通过<c0><a1>setGapStrategy(int)</a1></c0>控制这种行为。
You can create constraints only between a constraint handle and an anchor point that share the same plane.
只能在共享的同一平面的约束句柄和锚点之间创建约束。
You can define the distance from the edge with margin.
你可以使用margin定义到边缘的距离。

You can do all of the things you would do with a fully customized component, but by starting with a more specialized class in the View hierarchy, you can also get a lot of behavior for free that probably does exactly what you want.
一个完全自定义的可以做的，继承一个更特定的view也可以做，而且你还能免费获得更多的行为，也许正是你想要的行为。
You can have as many stretchable sections as you want: their relative size stays the same, so the largest sections always remain the largest.
你可以有任意多的可伸缩部分，它们的将保持相对的大小，所以最大的部分始终是最大的。
You can offset the alignment by dragging the view inward from the constraint.
您可以通过从视图向内拖动约束来偏移对齐。
You can position the guideline within the layout based on either dp units or percent, relative to the layout's edge.
你可以根据相对于布局边缘的dp单位或者百分百在布局中定位参考线。
You can register such a listener using <c1><a2>setOnFocusChangeListener(android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener)</a2></c1>.
你可以注册这样一监听器，使用<c1><a2>setOnFocusChangeListener(android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener)</a2></c1>。
You can rely on these positions to be consistent with what user is currently seeing on the screen.
你可以依赖这些位置, 这些位置与用户当前在屏幕上看到的位置是一致的。
You can see some sample usages of the LabelView custom View in <a0>custom_view_1.xml</a0> from the samples.
你可在示例中的<a0>custom_view_1.xml</a0>文件中看到一些使用示例。
You can set the view size to a ratio such as 16:9 if at least one of the view dimensions is set to "match constraints" (<c0>0dp</c0>).
如果至少有一个view尺寸设置为“match constraints” (<c0>0dp</c0>)，则可以将view大小设置为比例，例如16:9。
You can specify the layout using the declarative XML files just like with an activity screen, or you can create views programmatically and nest them into the layout from your code.
就像Activity一样，你可以在XML文件中申明布局，也可以通过编程的方式用代码嵌套。

You can supply a constructor which can take attributes and parameters from the XML, and you can also consume your own such attributes and parameters (perhaps the color and range of the VU meter, or the width and damping of the needle, etc.)
你可以提供一个构造方法来从XML文件中获取属性和参数，你也可以使用这些属性和参数（比如VU表范围的颜色，指针的宽度和阻尼等）。
You can then adjust the whole chain's bias (left/right or up/down) by changing the chain's head view bias.
然后，您可以通过更改链头view的偏差来调整整个链的偏差(左/右或上/下)。
You can use constraints to achieve different types of layout behavior, as described in the following sections.
你可以使用约束来实现不同类型的布局行为，如一下各章节所述。
You can use the corner handles to resize a view, but this hard codes the size so the view will not resize for different content or screen sizes.
你可以使用拐角手柄来调整view大小，但这样会硬编码大小，因此view不会调整为不同的内容或屏幕尺寸大小。
You could capture other events like key presses and handle them in some custom way (such as for a game).
你可以捕获其他事件，比如按键，并且自己处理事件（比如在游戏中）。

You could combine a group of View components into a new single component, perhaps to make something like a ComboBox (a combination of popup list and free entry text field), a dual-pane selector control (a left and right pane with a list in each where you can re-assign which item is in which list), and so on.
你可以用一组View组件组成一个新的单一组件，比如类似于一个ComboBox（弹出窗口列表和一个自由输入的文本框的组合）、一个双窗口的选择控制器（左右窗口各有一个列表，你可以重新分配哪些item是在所选列表中）等等。（译注：第二个比如日类似日期、时间选择的那种）
You could create a completely custom-rendered View type, for example a "volume control" knob rendered using 2D graphics, and which resembles an analog electronic control.
你可以创建完全自己渲染的View类，比如一个用2D图呈现的“音量控制”旋扭。
You could override the way that an EditText component is rendered on the screen (the <a0>Notepad Tutorial</a0> uses this to good effect, to create a lined-notepad page).
你可以重写EditText在屏幕上呈现的方式（<a0>Notepad Tutorial</a0>使用这点创建一个按行排的记事本，效果良好）。
You do not need to override all of these methods.
你不需要重写所有的方法。
You do not need to write Javadoc for trivial get and set methods such as <c0>setFoo()</c0> if all your Javadoc would say is "sets Foo".
你不需要为琐碎的类似<c0>setFoo()</c0>的get、set方法写Javadoc，否则这些Javadoc都会写上"设置Foo"。
You indicate a stretchable section by drawing one (or more) 1-pixel-wide black line(s) in the left and top part of the border (the other border pixels should be fully transparent or white).
你可以通过在左边框或上边框，画一段或多段1像素宽的黑线，来指明可伸缩的部分。（其他的边框像素应该完全透明或是白色）
You might also create your own properties with accessors and modifiers, for example, allow the EditText value to be set initially in the component and query for its contents when needed.
你也可以创建你自己属性的访问和修改方法，比如允许设置EditText的初始值获当需要时获取它的内容。（译注：allow the EditText value to be set initially in the component and query for its contents when needed，我也不知道是获取初始值的内容还是EditText的内容，反正影响不大。）
You might need to make some adjustments to be sure the layout responds as you intend for different screen sizes and orientations.
您可能需要进行一些调整，以确保布局响应您打算为不同的屏幕尺寸和方向。
You might override other <c0>on...</c0> methods, like <c1>onKeyDown()</c1>, to perhaps choose certain default values from the popup list of a combo box when a certain key is pressed.
你可能要重写一些<c0>on...</c0>方法，比如重写<c1>onKeyDown()</c1>方法，当某个按键按下时，从combo box的popup list中选择某个值。

You must always be on the UI thread when calling any method on any view.</e0> If you are doing work on other threads and want to update the state of a view from that thread, you should use a <c1><a2>Handler</a2></c1>.
你必须在主线程调用任何view的任何方法。</e0>如果你在其他线程工作并想在那个线程更新view的状态，应该使用<c1><a2>Handler</a2></c1>。
You must call <c0><a1>getSupportFragmentManager()</a1></c0> to get the <c2><a3>FragmentManager</a3></c2>
你必须调用<c0><a1>getSupportFragmentManager()</a1></c0>以获得<c2><a3>FragmentManager</a3></c2>。
You must handle every Exception in your code in a principled way; the specific handling varies depending on the case.
你必须在代码中以某种规矩来处理所有的异常。根据情况的不同，处理的方式也会不一样。
You should log only what is needed to gather enough information about what is going on about your component.
应该只记录那些有关控件运行所必需的信息。
You should not call methods that perform these actions on views yourself unless you are actually implementing a <c0><a1>ViewGroup</a1></c0>.
你不应在view中调用方法来执行这些操作，除非你实际上继承了一个<c0><a1>ViewGroup</a1></c0>。
You will almost certainly want to override <c0>onMeasure()</c0> and are also likely to need to override <c1>onDraw()</c1> if you want the component to show something.
如果你想要你的组伯显示一些东西，几乎可以肯定你需要重写<c0>onMeasure()</c0>和<c1>onDraw()</c1>方法。
You will probably want to create your own event listeners, property accessors and modifiers, and possibly more sophisticated behavior in your component class as well.
你也可以在你的组件类中创建自己的事件监听器，属性的获取、设置方法，也可能更复杂的行为。
Your activity must extend <c0><a1>FragmentActivity</a1></c0>
你的activity必须继承<c0><a1>FragmentActivity</a1></c0>
Your component's <c0>onMeasure()</c0> method should calculate a measurement width and height which will be required to render the component.
你的组件的 <c0>onMeasure()</c0> 方法将计算出一个测量的宽度和高度，以用来呈现该组件。
a float value, representing a ratio between width and height
浮点值，表示宽度与高度之间的比例。
a logical type and that its value should be one of the explicitly
表示一个逻辑类型，并且它的值应该是显示指明的常量之一。
a ratio in the form "width:height"
"width:height"形式的比例
abstract <a0>Class</a0><? extends <a1>Annotation</a1>>
abstract <a0>Class</a0><? extends <a1>Annotation</a1>>
abstract <a0>String</a0>
abstract <a0>String</a0>
abstract boolean
abstract boolean
abstract int
abstract int
adapter position: Position of an item in the adapter.
adapter position（适配器位）: item在adapter中的位置。
an array of <t0>StackTraceElement</t0>, each represents one stack frame.
一个<t0>StackTraceElement</t0>数组，每一个元素表示一个堆栈帧。
an exact number
一个精确的数字
and the actual permission requirement for this particular intent is described on the Intent name itself:
对这个特定意图的实际权限要求是在 intent 名称本身上描述的：
